title: Marked

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
At Night 1, you may visit and Mark someone, that player will have to visit and Mark someone the next night instead of performing their night action.
If the current Marked player ever dies, the last Marked will regain their Mark ability.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: Every 3 nights (3, 6, 9... etc), the Marked player takes an Unstoppable attack.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value:
Survive until the end of the game.
